name: Sunset (itch) (Arcadim)
description:
Sunset is a fast paced third-person fighting game where you wield your sword in a  duel to the death.

Charge attacks to break through your opponents guard, dash to close the distance between you and your foe, and overpower them in epic clashes. 

-Use WASD to move.

-Click left mouse button to attack.

-Hold left mouse button to do a charge attack.

-Hold right mouse button to block.

-Use the scroll wheel to dash.
